pkgmetadata.longdescription: Value Added in Exports with International Input-Output Table Tools // Decomposition of value added in exports in an international input-output table framework using the methodologies of Borin and Mancini (2019) https://openknowledge.worldbank.org/handle/10986/31533, Miroudot and Ye (2021) doi:10.1080/09535314.2020.1730308, Wang et al. (2013) https://econpapers.repec.org/paper/nbrnberwo/19677.htm and Koopman et al. (2014) doi:10.1257/aer.104.2.459. Includes commands for easy data extraction, calculation of complex matrices and other useful tools for geographical and sector trade analysis.
